column4: Hmmmn i did what UButtu said to do, but can not find opera web broswer :(
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/OperaBrowser follow the instructions on that page
once you add it, you have to reload your lists, either "reload" in synaptic, or sudo apt-get update, then you'll be able to see it.
yes, because you haven't added the key to the opera repository to your keyring.
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/OperaBrowser  the second line thing near the top.
